name: Ludum Dare 41
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 41 with the theme: Combine 2 incompatible genres.

If you couldn't guess from the name, my genres are Platformer and Farming.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys or W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Jump + Double Jump

Remove or Sell items - Click

HOW TO PLAY:

Navigate around the map to harvest Plants, and collect Fruit and Coins.

Sell your fruit to the merchant.

Collect as many Coins as you can.

There are 3 secret pathways, can you find them all?

UPDATE:

This is the Ludum Dare version of this game. If you want the full release version go here --> https://lozzadawg.itch.io/platfarmer
